page.title: 08Wivelsfield - Employment
page.content:
Most of the 'bread-winners' work outside the area in the surrounding towns, at Gatwick Airport, Croydon and London.
St Francis psychiatric hospital is one of the biggest employers, the laundry of which services a number of other hospitals and the ambulance service. Other local employment is mostly in shops, garages, pubs, the school and on farms.A builders' merchants / hauliers also provides a number of jobs. The abbatoir in Wivelsfield Green is a family run concern employing about 12 people. Often sons follow their fathers into the work.
Unemployment is low compared with the rest of the country.
